amendment.description: An amendment numbered 13 printed in Part B of House Report 118-272 to transfer funds from Health and Human Services General Department Management to the Inspector General to combat waste, fraud, and abuse.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Boebert amendment (A010) Agreed to by voice vote.

action.text: House amendment agreed to: On agreeing to the Boebert amendment (A010) Agreed to by voice vote.
House amendment agreed to: On agreeing to the Boebert amendment (A010) Agreed to by voice vote.
